title: Nas - Illmatic XX (2014) [FLAC]
description:
"Thank you
To everyone who worked on this album. All the illmatical producers on this, who helped me get my vision get out there. To everyone who inspired me, the golden rap era before me. To all my supporters. To rap fans worldwide. Where ever you are, I'm grateful for the day this album blasted its way into your playlist. Making this record, I was thinking as a young kid in the projects. Now I'm a man with kids, I never knew it would come to this. Illmatic truly means work hard, focus, and never stop until you're truly the illest ever!!! Now I feel like it's a responsibility that I have now to be a positive light on every music lover or "fan" of mine.

Love..
Eternally yours

One love

Nas"

(From the liner notes)

The remaster sounds great, enjoy one of the greatest hip-hop albums of all time in that lovely lossless FLAC quality.

Disc 1: Illmatic
01 - The Genesis
02 - N.Y. State Of Mind
03 - Life's A Bitch (feat. AZ)
04 - The World Is Yours
05 - Halftime
06 - Memory Lane (Sittin' In Da Park)
07 - One Love
08 - One Time 4 Your Mind
09 - Represent
10 - It Ain't Hard To Tell

Disc 2: Demos, Remixes & Live Radio
01 - I'm A Villain
02 - The Stretch Armstrong and Bobbito Show on WKCR October 28, 1993 feat. Nas, 6'9, Jungle & Grand Wizard
03 - Halftime (Butcher Remix)
04 - It Ain't Hard To Tell (Remix)
05 - One Love (LG Main Mix)
06 - Life's A Bitch (Arsenal Mix)
07 - One Love (One L Main Mix)
08 - The World Is Yours (Tip Mix)
09 - It Ain't Hard To Tell (The Stink Mix)
10 - It Ain't Hard To Tell (The Laidback Remix)

Be sure to support Nas by seeing him live if he's in your area!
